Geothermal Reservoir.Description: Geothermal reservoirs supply the heat necessary for geothermal power plants to generate electricity.
Geothermal reservoirs are utilized by heat pumps to provide heating and cooling for buildings.
Hot springs are formed when geothermal reservoirs of hot water reach the surface.
Geothermal reservoirs are often formed as a result of volcanic activity, where magma heats underground water.
